name: tumiki-proxy
description: Transparent MCP logging proxy with multi-transport support (stdio, HTTP/StreamableHTTP, HTTP/SSE)

scripts.build:binary: npm run build:bundle && pkg dist/bundle.js --compress GZip --targets node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64,node18-linux-x64,node18-win-x64 --output dist/tumiki-proxy
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:binary

author: tumiki-proxy contributors
